publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-641 Rosie Kane: Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers—That the Parliament notes the plight of the asylum seeker named as "Margaret" featured on "Newsnight Scotland" on 19 November 2003; notes the continuation of the brutal practice of female genital mutilation in Margaret’s homeland of Sierra Leone and the extreme danger that Margaret’s daughters would face if they were to be returned there; resolves to oppose by all necessary means the deportation of women and children to countries where female genital mutilation is practised; calls upon the Home Office to end the asylum lottery in which legitimate refugees are refused asylum because of poor legal representation and erratic asylum adjudicators, and resolves to oppose any attempt to detain or deport Margaret and her children when they attend the Glasgow office of the Immigration and Nationality Directorate on 29 November 2003.

S2M-641 Rosie Kane: Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers-That the Parliament notes the plight of the asylum seeker named as "Margaret" featured on "Newsnight Scotland" on 19 November 2003; notes the continuation of the brutal practice of female genital mutilation in Margaret's homeland of Sierra Leone and the extreme danger that Margaret's daughters would face if they were to be returned there; resolves to oppose by all necessary means the deportation of women and children to countries where female genital mutilation is practised; calls upon the Home Office to end the asylum lottery in which legitimate refugees are refused asylum because of poor legal representation and erratic asylum adjudicators, and resolves to oppose any attempt to detain or deport Margaret and her children when they attend the Glasgow office of the Immigration and Nationality Directorate on 29 November 2003. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Colin Fox*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-641 Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers (lodged on 20 November 2003) Elaine Smith*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-641 Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers (lodged on 20 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-641 Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers (lodged on 20 November 2003) John Farquhar Munro*
S2M-641 Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers (lodged on 20 November 2003) Alex Neil*
S2M-641 Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers (lodged on 20 November 2003) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-641 Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers (lodged on 20 November 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-641 Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers (lodged on 20 November 2003) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-641 Female Genital Mutilation and Asylum Seekers (lodged on 20 November 2003) Brian Adam*
